# Welcome To this repo

## Here, we'll build Decenterlized Blockchain based Voting Project

Here, I collaborate with my two friend to create a voting app, as my final-year-project.

## Tools Used:

We had used mordern tech stack to create a proper functional working project. We had use hardhad for blockchain based backend, along with vite react app. For state management we used redux, and for decentrized document storage, we'll use [Pinata Service](https://pinata.cloud/).

<div align="center">
    <img src="https://skillicons.dev/icons?i=vscode,bun,vite,react,redux,solidity" />
<img src="data:image/png;base64," alt="hardhat_logo" width="45px" style="border-radius:5px;" />

</div>

## How to get Start?

You may need first to install `bun.js` To install it just open powershell (in Administer), and run:

```
powershell -c "irm bun.sh/install.ps1|iex"
```

Once you had bun installed, run following commands:

```shell
# Clone the project and go to the root directory
git clone https://github.com/arslan-ahm/blockchain-voting-dapp-FYP.git
cd blockchain-voting-dapp-FYP

# Install root (Hardhat backend) dependencies
bun install

# Compile smart contracts (optional if ABI is already available)
bunx hardhat compile

# (Optional) Deploy contracts to local node
bunx hardhat run scripts/deploy.ts --network localhost

# Move to frontend
cd front-end

# Install frontend dependencies
bun install

# Start frontend development server
bun run dev
```

#### NOTE: You should not push code directly into 'main' branch, provide pull request owner will merge your request.

## Contribution:

To Merge code run follow commands:

```
git add .


git commit -m "[feat]/[fix]/[docs] <write a meaningful comment>"

# In your own branch not in main
git push origin <branch_name>

# After this generate a pull request from github, and add detail of changes you made in description, and send pull request.
```
